title: Kari Laukkanen
text:
Kari Laukkanen (born 14 December 1963 in <a href="Pielavesi">Pielavesi</a>, <a href="Finland">Finland</a>) is a retired <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>.
During his club career, Laukkanen notably played for <a href="KuPS">KuPS</a>, <a href="Stuttgarter%20Kickers">Stuttgarter Kickers</a> and <a href="Waldhof%20Mannheim">Waldhof Mannheim</a>. He also made 49 Appearances for the Finland national team. He is the current coach of <a href="NJS%20Nurmij%C3%A4rvi">NJS Nurmijärvi</a>, playing in <a href="Kolmonen">Kolmonen</a> as well as goalkeeping coach for <a href="Finland%20national%20under-21%20football%20team">Finland's U21 team</a>.
